General.Name: Hydration Pharmaceuticals Company Ltd
General.Description: The Hydration Pharmaceuticals Company Limited markets and sells a range of liquid, tablet, and powder healthy hydration products in Australia, the Unites States, and Canada. It sells its products under the Hydralyte brand name through retail stores and e-commerce channels. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in San Diego, California.
General.Address: 4660 La Jolla Village Drive, San Diego, CA, United States, 92122
